properties.property: Displays the search results and the properties associated with them.
This webpart helps the users to refine search results

WebPart.Title: Functions Documents
WebPart.Description: Allows authors to enter rich text content.

properties.property: Allows authors to insert HTML snippets or scripts.

<style>
                /* Reduced size tiles */
                /*  tile row height */
                div.ms-promlink-body {
                    height:100px;
                    }
                /*  tile dimensions, including inter-tile margin */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-root {
                    width:105px !important;
                    height:105px !important;
                    }
                /*  tile and title( + description) overlay dimensions */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-content, div.ms-tileview-tile-detailsBox {
                    width:99px !important;
                    height:99px !important;
                    }
                /*  tile background image dimensions */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-content > a > img {
                    width:100%;
                    height:100%;
                    }
                /*  title and description text  */
                ul.ms-tileview-tile-detailsListMedium {
                    height:100px;
                    padding:4px 7px 7px;
                    font-size:11px;
                    line-height:14px;
                    }
                /*  description text class  */
                li.ms-tileview-tile-descriptionMedium {
                    padding-top:10px;
                    padding-left:2px;
                    font-size:11px;
                    }
                /*  title text when description not shown  */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-titleTextMediumCollapsed {
                    background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
                    width:86px;
                    height:29px;
                    position:absolute;
                    top:-33px;
                    left:0px;
                    padding:4px 7px 0px 8px;
                    font-size:11px;
                    line-height:13px;
                    }
                .ms-tileview-tile-content img{
                    width:100px!important; 
                    height:100px!important;
                    } 
                .ms-promlink-header {
                  display:none;
                }
                </style>
Displays the search results and the properties associated with them.
This webpart helps the users to refine search results

WebPart.Title: Functions Documents
WebPart.Description: Allows authors to enter rich text content.

properties.property: Allows authors to insert HTML snippets or scripts.

<style>
                /* Reduced size tiles */
                /*  tile row height */
                div.ms-promlink-body {
                    height:100px;
                    }
                /*  tile dimensions, including inter-tile margin */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-root {
                    width:105px !important;
                    height:105px !important;
                    }
                /*  tile and title( + description) overlay dimensions */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-content, div.ms-tileview-tile-detailsBox {
                    width:99px !important;
                    height:99px !important;
                    }
                /*  tile background image dimensions */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-content > a > img {
                    width:100%;
                    height:100%;
                    }
                /*  title and description text  */
                ul.ms-tileview-tile-detailsListMedium {
                    height:100px;
                    padding:4px 7px 7px;
                    font-size:11px;
                    line-height:14px;
                    }
                /*  description text class  */
                li.ms-tileview-tile-descriptionMedium {
                    padding-top:10px;
                    padding-left:2px;
                    font-size:11px;
                    }
                /*  title text when description not shown  */
                div.ms-tileview-tile-titleTextMediumCollapsed {
                    background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
                    width:86px;
                    height:29px;
                    position:absolute;
                    top:-33px;
                    left:0px;
                    padding:4px 7px 0px 8px;
                    font-size:11px;
                    line-height:13px;
                    }
                .ms-tileview-tile-content img{
                    width:100px!important; 
                    height:100px!important;
                    } 
                .ms-promlink-header {
                  display:none;
                }
                </style>
